DannOrly?, I appriciate the fact you Seed this for us guys, but Seriously. Your an idiot. I downloaded the entire Series 2 To find out that I can't watch them because there Corrupted or what ever. I just hope you can justify yourself with some sort of Excuse that accountable. Wtf!

jjgaf, seriously, go fuck yourself with a rusty iron fork. Did I have to seed this shit? No. Did I have to pause everything else I'm seeding and let THIS AND ONLY THIS TORRENT seed for the sake of others? No. I made a mistake. I fixed it. Go chug bleach you fucking faggot, I don't see what you've contributed to the site. You have uploaded NOTHING. ZILCH. YOU, have contributed nothing. I have contributed greatly. 7/11 files still worked, and lazy fucksticks like you could have easily looked for the other 4 on this site and downloaded them individually. Man I fucking hate people like you, but luckily not eveyone is like you, and thus the reason I make this shit. Did I even have to make THIS one to make up for the last torrent I made? Hell no! I am under no moral obligation to do shit. Go take a long walk off a short pier and make sure not to breathe on the way down, dickbag.

Hey DannOrly, Just wanted to throw a quick thanks your way for the torrent. Not many people take the time to re-post if the first one doesn't work, that is if they upload at all. Don't let twat stains like jjgaff get to you. You're efforts are much appreciated!
Thanks man. I was in a bad mood that night, as you can tell haha. Oh well. But once again, thanks for the thanks =P
